item.title: Open Source Developer Forum (OSDForum)
item.author: info@openhwgroup.org (OpenHW Group)
item.description: The Open Source Developer Forum is a one workshop that brings open source SW and HW (chips, boards and systems) developers together to collaborate and learn. The OSDForum includes talks from leading industry and academic experts focused on IoT, Edge and Machine Learning development leveraging open source SW and HW building blocks.

item.title: OpenHW Group Summer 2019 Update
item.author: info@openhwgroup.org (OpenHW Group)
item.description: In case you missed it, we launched the OpenHW Group at the ETH Zurich WOSH / RISC-V Workshop this past June and we have a great event coming up this fall, Open Source Developer Forum (OSDForum)!

item.title: OpenHW Group Announced
item.author: info@openhwgroup.org (OpenHW Group)
item.description: OpenHW Group created and announces CORE-V family of open-source cores for use in high volume production SoCs Rick O’Connor, former Executive Director of the RISC-V Foundation, leads organization for collaboration, ecosystem development and open-source processor cores Ottawa, Canada and Zurich, Switzerland, June 6, 2019: A new not-for-profit global organization aims to boost the adoption of open-source processors by providing a platform for collaboration, creating a focal point for ecosystem development, and offering open-source IP for processor cores.

item.title: WOSH / RISC-V Workshop Zurich
item.author: info@openhwgroup.org (OpenHW Group)
item.description: Join us at the FOSSi Foundation Week of Open Source Hardware (WOSH) including the RISC-V Workshop in Zurich, June 11-14, 2019 to learn more about the OpenHW Group CORE-V Family of open-source RISC-V cores and contribute to the evolution of open-source processor core development.

item.title: OpenHW Group Privacy Policy
item.author: info@openhwgroup.org (OpenHW Group)
item.description: May 29, 2019 The OpenHW Group, Inc. (“OpenHW Group”, “Us” or “We”) is a member-supported not-for-profit organization which acts as the steward of our open source projects, community, and ecosystem. We are committed to our community members’ rights to privacy. We promise to share transparently all aspects of how OpenHW Group projects and websites work in regards to privacy, terms, and personal data, and We are in full support of efforts to ensure your protection online.

item.title: OpenHW Group Terms of Use
item.author: info@openhwgroup.org (OpenHW Group)
item.description: May 28, 2019 Terms and Conditions of Use for the OpenHW Group Web Site and Related Services As used herein, the term “you” means the individual accessing this Web site, as well as any person or entity which has granted to such individual the authority to enter into this agreement on its behalf. By accessing, browsing, or using this Web site, you acknowledge that you have read, understand, and agree to be bound by these terms.
